item.title: Build own Smart Home system, Part 1
item.description: To help my kids learn programming, we decided to build our own Smart Home system. This is Part 1 of the series, setting up the development environment and getting the room temperature.

item.title: Understanding BLE throughput on Android
item.description: We have been told that the BLE can reach a throughput of 1 Mbps (or 2 Mbps with Bluetooth 5.0). But why do we always feel it’s extremely slow in practice? In this article, I will try to explain this, and how to improve throughput on Android.
